author: flare(flare#0001)
install_msg:
Command Statistics, Check out commands used in a guild, globally or in the current session(while the cog is loaded). Note to developers: This cog allows you to record 3rd part events. See: <https://github.com/flaree/Flare-Cogs/pull/28>
This command will save the data to config ever 5 minutes to prevent loss of data.
name: CommandStats
description: Track all commands used globally, guild wise and during the current session.
